# Copilot Instructions for aloevera-setup

## Output Conventions
- Always use `[OK]` instead of checkmarks (âœ“) in script output
- Status indicators: `[OK]`, `[FAIL]`, `[WARN]`
- Never use emoji in script output

## Project Context
This is a Windows setup automation project using WinGet DSC (Desired State Configuration) for declarative system configuration.
